item.title: Marriott Trims Its Full Year Outlook
item.description: Kevin Kopelman, TD Cowen Research Analyst, told Open Interest that appetite for outbound travel is increasing whereas demand for travel into the US is weak. For Marriott, demand for its global portfol

item.title: TD Bank Needs to Turn on Earnings ‘Afterburners’ to Extend Winning Streak
item.description: Toronto-Dominion Bank’s stock surge is sustainable, market watchers believe, but only if the bank sends the right message to shareholders and delivers solid earnings for the rest of the year.

item.title: TD Bank Needs to Turn on Earnings ‘Afterburners’ to Extend Winning Streak
